title: Can I use my phone as a mobile WLAN hotspot and access the Internet from another device using my phone's data connection?
answer:
You can use your mobile phone as a portable Wi-Fi hotspot and share your mobile phone's mobile data connection with another device. Then you can access the Internet from the device. 

 Touch Settings > Moreâ€¦ > Tethering & portable hotspot > Portable Wi-Fi hotspot. 

 Now you can access the Internet from the device using your phone's data connection to the network. 

 [In addition, you can set the hotspot name and encryption mode in Portable Wi-Fi hotspot settings. ]()
